Params: {2: 'Aircraft System', 3: '—Prepare to depart L-7 returning orbit—'}
{2: 'Aircraft System', 3: '—Moving through low Earth Corrupted ring—'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Seventeen hours ago, we got new eyewitness accounts on the Ascendants.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'They were last seen in the western base of the Gangdise Mountains—a place called the Jijing Monastery.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'During this time, there was a massive outbreak of the Punishing Virus throughout the area. Reports claim that it is highly concentrated.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Why would Ascendants appear in a place like that...?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Don't look into it too much for now. We're going to cross the Karman line and enter the atmosphere. Make sure the commandant doesn't have a bitten tongue after this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Don't panic. Let me check the radar data first. It could just be a false alarm... wait..."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The radar shows that a barrage of long-ranged projectiles has locked onto us. They appear to be interstellar cruise missiles...'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I've also got a reading on Punishing Virus reaction!"}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The Punishing Virus... low Earth missile attacks... Must be the space station!'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "No, the space station isn't capable of attacking us while we're in low Earth orbit..."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "We're flying through a minefield—the remains of warships infected by the Punishing Virus are activating as we pass."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Normally, they should only lock onto transport-class airships...'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Dammit... I chose to go the long way to stay out of danger, but I got us stuck in low Earth orbit for too long...'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Can we shake them off our tail?'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's too late. With our entry speed into the stratosphere, we can't outrun the missiles."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Even in the most optimistic scenario, the missiles will hit us in thirty seconds...'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I got this. Activating manual flight control.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Done...! Commandant I need to maintain operational procedures. Take the wheel.'}
{3: 'A missile explodes near the airdrop jet, throwing you into disarray.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Arrgh... The centrifugal force is... too strong...'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "We have. I'm guessing our commandant graduated at the top of the class."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Our airdrop jet should be a bit more agile, comparatively speaking... Let's change direction to widen the gap first."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Wait, what?! They're approaching from the other side too?"}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Wait... Commandant, something is approaching from the surface... It's coming in hot!"}
{3: 'Suddenly, all of the missiles explode behind your jet.'}
{2: 'Aircraft System', 3: '—Entering the atmosphere blackout zone. Engaging silent mode—'}
